item.title: What if?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

It would be a much better world as PIV (Penis in vagina) is rape: http://witchwind.wordpress.com/2013/12/15/piv-is-always-rape-ok/

Christians should support such a society, with mostly gay sex there would be no unwanted pregnancy and thus less abortions. Homosexuality just gets more and more acceptable and will soon be more acceptable than heterosexually.

Read full topic

item.title: What if?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

It would be entirely impossible for nature to take that course considering that breeding would come first and seem natural. Male and female have their genital parts for a reason and yes it is (by nature alone) considered unnatural to be homosexual. I feel that if being homosexual was normal, well then being heterosexual would be just as normal or an equal for the simple fact that breeding is one of the most important things in nature, for all creatures.

Read full topic

item.title: What if?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:3, topic:538114”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=656934.msg4395098#msg4395098 date=1388877995]
“What if” can go on for centuries and you still would have things to question beginning with “what if”.
What if humans were a-sexual
What if we were more intelligent creatures
What if we had 4 eyes
What if everyone had a second mouth
What if women didn’t exist
What if women were the dominate gender
[size=1pt]what if women had rights?[/size]

I’ve seen this before, and I don’t think that could be possible unless someone created a only-homosexual society that was cut off from the rest of civilization for hundreds of years until straight people were basically a legend to them and were considered bad.
Which wouldn’t be possible because how would they conceive children (Inb4 someone says sperm banks or artificial insemination).
Being gay has rapidly become more socially acceptable than ever before, but society still needs time to change because the older generations still have their values and beliefs heavily tied into the system.
[/quote]Wow wow women having rights, calm down.

But the what if was to that video, what is hetrosexual was bad and homosexual was normal? With breeding seasons as stated in this video.[/quote]
I’ve seen the video float around a few times. I never watched the entire thing nor do I plan to.

Read full topic

item.title: What if?

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

“What if” can go on for centuries and you still would have things to question beginning with “what if”.
What if humans were a-sexual
What if we were more intelligent creatures
What if we had 4 eyes
What if everyone had a second mouth
What if women didn’t exist
What if women were the dominate gender
[size=1pt]what if women had rights?[/size]

I’ve seen this before, and I don’t think that could be possible unless someone created a only-homosexual society that was cut off from the rest of civilization for hundreds of years until straight people were basically a legend to them and were considered bad.
Which wouldn’t be possible because how would they conceive children (Inb4 someone says sperm banks or artificial insemination).
Being gay has rapidly become more socially acceptable than ever before, but society still needs time to change because the older generations still have their values and beliefs heavily tied into the system.
